result.execSummary:
The defendant Mark Timothy Koch was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mark Timothy Koch

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Mark Timothy Koch in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. On motion of the State Court amended Count 1 from Criminal Trespass to Dwelling  to Disorderly Conduct under County Ordinance 63.01 at which time Defendant entered a plea of NO CONTEST. Court found the Defendant guilty.  Court orders Defendant to pay a fine of $50.00 including costs to be paid by 01-25-2016.  Failure to pay shall result in a Civil Judgment with tax intercept.
DISCHARGE SUMMARY FILED, JUCTICE POINT JULY 13, 2015. kl

Defendant Mark Timothy Koch in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija via-telephone.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Court ordered stayed warrant cancelled. Case calendared for status conference / calendar call on July 7, 2015 at 1:30 p.m. For reasons stated on the record,   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37. Court referred defendant to report to Justice Point Program. Defendant was taken into custody for commitment warrant. Contacted Justice Point Program with defendant's update.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Colin McGinn for Attorney Gabriela A Leija in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status conference.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next scheduled hearing.  Status conference scheduled for July 7, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Program report dated July 2, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Justice Point Program violation report: Missed office contact;  received and filed. Court reviewed violation and will be addressed at next scheduled hearing.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Status conference on July 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Mark Timothy Koch in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status conference. State needs additional time to discuss matter with complaining witness. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Program report dated June 8, 2015; received and filed. Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Mark Timothy Koch in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status conference. Case in court due to violation.  Arguments heard as to bail. Court admonishes Defendant. No action taken at this time. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for June 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Program report dated May 21, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Justice Point Program violation report; received and filed. Court reviewed violation and will address on May 22, 2015.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Mark Timothy Koch in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Pre-trial conference held off the record.  Defense counsel has received discovery and offer. State to provide additional information. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for May 22, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Program report dated April 27, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with ALEXIA M OR HER RESIDENCE.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION INCLUDING DRUG TESTING.
   Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Mark Timothy Koch in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Defendant Mark Timothy Koch in custody.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 28, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
